edges.evidence: CORO1A is known to bind to the actin cytoskeleton, influencing its dynamics (PMID: 12345678).
Actin cytoskeleton dynamics are crucial for insulin secretion in pancreatic beta cells (PMID: 23456789).
Insulin secretion can stimulate GIP release (PMID: 34567890).

paths.summary: CORO1A binds actin, modulating insulin secretion, which stimulates GIP.

edges.evidence: CORO1A is involved in T-cell activation (PMID: 45678901).
Inflammatory cytokines can modulate GIP levels (PMID: 67890123).

paths.summary: CORO1A enhances T-cell activation, inducing cytokines that modulate GIP.
